mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval (approval_no,approval_title, approval_kind, approval_note, created_at) VALUES (#{approval_no}, #{approval_title}, #{approval_kind}, #{approval_note}, #{created_at})

INSERT INTO approver (approver_no,approval_no, approval_orther, approval_status, aproval_at, user_id) VALUES (#{approver_no}, #{approval_no}, #{approval_orther}, #{approval_status}, #{aproval_at}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select approval_no,user_id,approval_title,approval_kind,approval_note,date(created_at) as created_at, (select name from user where user_id = approval.user_id) as name from approval where approval_no = #{ approval_no }
